attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election so that we may restore faith in our elected representatives and parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 'MP's expenses' debacle has outraged the British public and destroyed the credibility of this parliament. We need a general election to restore good governance and our faith in those we elect to serve us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
